pr_title: make subquery in SubqueryRouteTest work well

timeline.message: make subquery in SubqueryRouteTest work well

timeline.bodyText:
Hi, Sorry for the late feedback.
Do you think it is possible to move this function to SelectStatementContext referring to #6319.
Basically, xxxStatement is designed as a POJO object, and we put more logic coding into xxxStatementContext for rewriting.
timeline.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText: Besides, I presume #6319 finished part of your work, so my suggestion is you'd better give it check, and if possible, a coding merging and optimizing is welcomed. :-)
replies.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText: @tristaZero Thank you for your suggestions, I will check and optimize this function. 😊
replies.author: strongduanmu
